display_long_description:
Step into an intense VR zombie survival experience where every shot and decision matters. Armed from the start, you’ll battle endless waves of the undead while protecting a terrified young girl. Land headshots to earn bonus ammo — and when your health gets low, head to glowing green checkpoints to heal and monitor your health status right from your wrist.

🎮 Gameplay Overview

    Endless Survival Mode
    One mode, all action — face wave after wave of zombies that grow faster and more dangerous over time.

    Headshots Give Ammo
    Accuracy is rewarded. Each headshot gives you extra bullets, encouraging skillful shooting.

 Restore Health at Green Checkpoints
    Watch for glowing green checkpoints during combat — standing in them will recover your health.

    Weapons Available in-Game
    No unlocks or menus. Grab weapons as you go — pistols, rifles, and more — right from the environment.

    Immersive VR Combat
    Manual reloading, physical aiming, and motion controller support make every encounter feel real and intense.

    Escort a Young Survivor
    A frightened girl follows you throughout the outbreak. Keep her close and protected — she depends on you.

    Boss Fights
    Face powerful, mutated zombie bosses that test your reflexes and firepower.

    End-of-Round Stats
    Review your performance after each run.

 Key Features

    One endless survival mode

    Ammo bonus for headshots

    Health recovery via green checkpoints

    Full VR weapon handling
